name: workflow_search_for_location
description: Find a location on OpenStreetMap and optionally specify a zoom level. PRECONDITION: Can be called from any page. Successful outcome: The map is automaticallycentered on the first search result. The URL will contain the coordinates (latitute and longitude).

steps.description: Navigate to OpenStreetMap and search for the location.

input_schema.name: base_url
input_schema.description: Base URL of the OpenStreetMap instance (e.g., http://3.12.136.212:3000)

input_schema.name: location
input_schema.description: Location to find (e.g., 'Boston', 'Harvard University', '123 Main St, Cambridge, MA')

input_schema.name: zoom_level
input_schema.description: Map zoom level (higher = more zoomed in)
